title: unesco_heritage_Fortifications_on_the_Caribbean_Side_of_Panama__Portobelo-San_Lorenzo
text:
Name: Fortifications on the Caribbean Side of Panama: Portobelo-San Lorenzo. short_description:

Magnificent examples of 17th- and 18th-century military architecture, these Panamanian forts on the Caribbean coast form part of the defence system built by the Spanish Crown to protect transatlantic trade.

. date_inscribed: 1980. danger: 1. date_end: . longitude: -79.65583333. latitude: 9.553888889. area_hectares: 0. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Panama. Region: Latin America and the Caribbean. iso_code: pa. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
